                                                                              public class TestLog {
    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(TestLog.class);

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        logger.info("This is info log test.");
        logger.warn("This is warn log test.");
        logger.error("This is error log test.");
    }
}

                                                                              • 2ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•ç±»ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£æ–¹å¼å®Œæˆï¼š@RunWithã€@ContextConfigurationå’Œ@org.junit.Test

//åŠ è½½é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
@ContextConfiguration("classpath:bean15.xml")
public class JTest4 {
    @Autowired
    private TransferRecordService transferRecordService;

    @Test
    public void test() {
        transferRecordService.transferAccounts(100, "Lucy", "Mary");
    }
}

                                                                              # 5.2ã€æ•´åˆJunit5

                                                                              • 1ï¼‰å¼•å…¥ç›¸å…³çš„jaråŒ…

                                                                              • 2ï¼‰åˆ›å»ºæµ‹è¯•ç±»ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ³¨è§£å®Œæˆï¼š@ExtendWithã€@ContextConfigurationå’Œ@org.junit.jupiter.api.Test

    private TransferRecordService transferRecordService;

    @Test
    public void test() {
        transferRecordService.transferAccounts(100, "Lucy", "Mary");
    }
}

                                                                              ä¸è¿‡ Spring ä¸­æä¾›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ›´ä¸ºç®€å•çš„æ–¹å¼å¯ä»¥ç®€åŒ–ä»£ç 

                                                                              • 4ï¼‰ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªå¤åˆæ³¨è§£ä»£æ›¿ä¸Šè¿°ä¸¤ä¸ªæ³¨è§£å®Œæˆæ•´åˆï¼š@SpringJUnitConfig

        transferRecordService.transferAccounts(100, "Lucy", "Mary");
    }
}
